channel.title: Seight Custom Cycling Wear: New Products - FlexorCranks
channel.description: A list of the new products at Seight Custom Cycling Wear.

item.title: FlexorCranks Custom Elite Long Sleeve Jersey
item.description:
Nothing provides you with protection and comfort when you are out for a ride like the Seight Elite Long Sleeve Jersey. Its wide surface area removes moisture from your body quickly to protect your skin against bacterial infections and odour. The high tech fibre f..

item.title: FlexorCranks Custom Winter Overshoes
item.description:
The Seight Winter Overshoes feature a contemporary design to take care of your feet and keep your bike footwear in great shape in the harshest of winters. Everyone wants to protect their feet from the cold during winter with the right pair of oversho..
